CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ! CONTAINS(Email, "gmail"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "google"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "hotmail"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "mail.com"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "yahoo"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "gmx"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "zoho"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "gawab"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "aol"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "aim"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "lavabit"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "excite"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "lycos"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "sbc"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "comcast"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "msn.com"), ! CONTAINS(Email, "mac.com") ), RIGHT(Email, LEN(Email) - FIND("@",Email)), "Not a valid Company domain" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: converts the email address to a suggested website for this contact
CustomField.label: Domain (from email address)
